Name: CRAFT BATTLE SIMULATOR
About the game: CRAFT BATTLE SIMULATOR is an awesome multiplayer game. You have to control a ship with the crew and cannons going around destroying other ships. This game is tons of fun to play with friends or even alone as you can single handedly dismantle a fleet if youâ€™re skilled enough.Teamwork is crucial on the seas, a captain is only as strong as his crew after all. The current features include: Single player mode Multiplayer mode Available on windows, mac linux Cross platform multiplayer Beautiful, low-poly visuals Funny physics Dynamic environments
